text: 'ina nkhsk whdk balebadt, wnsteyn bik whdk fi jmye amwrna, falamr klh bydk, la yamlik minh ahd mithqal dhr. wafi hadhih alayat dalil ealaa 'ana aleabd la yajuz lah 'an yusraf shyyana min 'anwae alebadt kaldea' walastghatht waldhbh waltwaf 'iilaa lilah whdh, wafiha shifa' alqulub min da' altelq bighayr allh, wamin 'amrad alrya' walejb, walkbrya'
